safetyTips: We are offering home deliveries just the same as the post office, where we are conversing with our customers before and giving an allotted time when we can deliver.  We are turning up with protective wear to ensure the safety of our customer.
name: Joanne Harmer Gallery
description: Joanne Harmer Gallery is an eclectic mix of 'magpie' must haves. Our products are perfect for those who wish to embelish their own homes, or those of friends and families, with beautiful accessories and fine art.
